lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. We mourn the loss of Barbara Goldsmith, 1999 recipient of Guild Hall's Academy of the Arts Lifetime Achievement Award for Literary Arts. Ruth Appelhof, Exec. Dir. Marty Cohen, Chairman Eric Fischl, Academy of the Arts President The Guild Hall Board of Trustees 1/3
